noun.description: The aggregate of people living together in a more or less ordered community.
examples: drugs, crime, and other dangers to society

noun.description: An organization or club formed for a particular purpose or activity.
examples: the American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals

noun.description: The situation of being in the company of other people.
examples: she shunned the society of others

origin: Mid 16th century (in the sense companionship, friendly association with others): from French société, from Latin societas, from socius companion.
